content:
Etymology of URI Ö Uniform

  • Uniformity allows

    • different types of resource identification within a single protocol element
    • uniform semantic interpretation of common syntactic elements; shared implementations
    • relative syntactic interpretation independent of scheme
    • extensibility for new identification schemes
    • bounds variability along common paths, making it easier to extend the use of URI to new applications
